item.title: APISIX - 1 - 网关搭建
item.description: 前置条件 已安装 Docker，Docker Compose 用于部署 etcd 和 APISIX 已安装 curl，用于验证 APISIX 是否安装成功 安装 1. 下载文件 初始化相关配置，添加apisix-dashboard配置文件夹以及文件 cd ~ git clone https://github.com/apache/apisix-docker.git cd apisix-docker/example mkdir dashboard_conf cd ~ cp apisix-docker/all-in-one/apisix-dashboard/conf.yaml apisix-docker/example/dashboard_conf mkdir apisix cp -r apisix-docker/example/* apisix rm -rf apisix-docker 2. apisix-dashboard 注意修改conf.etcd.endpoints为apisix可访问的地址 dashboard_conf/config.yaml，内容如下： # # Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more # contributor license agreements. See the NOTICE file distributed with # this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
